patents.title: Oral suction device
patents.abstract: An improved oral suction device for use in dental and medical procedures that provides enhanced control, comfort, and efficiency for both practitioners and patients.

patents.title: Peroxide gel composition
patents.abstract: A stabilized peroxide gel composition for dental and medical applications that provides improved efficacy and shelf life while minimizing sensitivity.

patents.title: UV disinfection system
patents.abstract: An ultraviolet disinfection system designed for medical equipment that provides thorough sanitization while ensuring safety for operators and protecting sensitive components.

patents.title: Self-expanding dilation plug
patents.abstract: A self-expanding dilation plug for medical procedures that provides controlled expansion and improved patient comfort during treatment.

patents.title: Portable self massage table and recovery device
patents.abstract: A portable massage table and recovery device that provides therapeutic benefits while being easily transported and set up in various environments.
